text:
Take in all the sights and sounds of Korok Forest with The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild Nintendo Switch 2 Edition.
 
Tune in at 7am PT tomorrow for Day 2 of Nintendo Treehouse: Live | Nintendo Switch 2!
Sure the graphics is great and its definitely an upgrade, but full price of the same game??
Why do we have to pay more money for a game we already own
NaN

Just going to drop this here for everyone

More games, better pricing
I would buy another Nintendo Switch if their games ever went on sale.
This is amazing but ridiculous to charge full price if we already own it!!
Excited
Drop the price!

Nintendo,

Be a darling and drop the price.

We won't be paying for upgrades of games we already bought.
it's crazy you folks are charging $70 for a 7 year old game!

We won't be paying for upgrades of games we already bought.
it's crazy you folks are charging $70 for a 7 year old game!
Not worth 80$.
Everything is so expensive, I'll be on the Switch 1 for at least 2 or 3 more years. At minimum.
Nintendo is the king of recycling: they repackage an old thing, sell it… then sell it again. I loved Zelda, but come on — don’t push it.
Might wait awhile before I get a Switch 2. Already have a PS5 and regular Switch
only thing that would even move the needle into my buying this console is a new zelda game like BOTW & TOTK
Still has that washed out look
They want 90 bucks this dlc content, guys.
We’ve hit a plateau in tech. Gaming systems barely have any difference. This includes phones & cameras, it’s all so minor and hardly worth the upgrade.

you made it blurry. lol. omg you losers are just doing what you did with the Nintendo 64. MARK MY WORDS. This ends Nintendo releasing consoles forever. They are a game company no different than SEGA now.
DROP THE PRICE.

It's always funny to me that these comparison videos always label which console is which. If the new switch 2 is so much better, like 450 dollars better, pointing out which is which shouldn't be necessary and even the untrained eye should know.
Translation:  You're not getting the Master Sword early; through the loading glitch.
Am I the only one who can’t see a clear difference between the 7 year old game and the “upgraded” version??
I can’t see myself paying for the upgrade when I’m also buying an expensive piece of hardware. Should be included.
Old good Nintendo is back. You had again one success and now you will milk it.
Someone said that the original cartridge will still have a slight performance and fps boost when played on switch 2 without the upgrade pack, can anyone confirm? I cant find it.
Nah how about you fix my Wii U version that can’t even run at 20 fps in some parts.
The Switch 1 game will run on 2? Need to buy another?
$500 for this
You should upload graphics comparison videos at 1080p at least.
Not worth 80$.

Nintendo will learn a hard lesson. Hardcore video gamers will make them pay for these horrible decisions.
Omg is that how bad it is on the switch
NaN
Will there be any new game play? At least some new DLC in celebration of the Switch 2?
Both versions look fantastic,   the switch 2 is looking more and more like its a nintendo pro
Whatever you're paying these people to shill for this slop I will do for it for half. DM me.
Haha
Now the game doesn't look washed out. Wish the copy I already own could look like that.
Make Nintendos in America
Switch v 1.3
Nobody cares. Your console is $450. Nobody will be purchasing it. I’m not saying this is a hater. My middle child’s name is link. I’m just sad that we won’t get to experience this console.
Make it free along with reducing the $80 price tag of mario kart world to $60 or I will sue you
surely you can upgrade for free? right???
I get that it's a $10 upgrade fee or free with NSO (which you'll take away if I can't or won't pay for a month) but I want it physically and $70 for a game from 8 years ago isn't cool. #droptheprice

Yeah, pay $80.00 for an already existing $70.00 game that rarely ever goes on discount. I may be a Zelda fan, but I will pass on this one. Nintendo, I am sorry I have to say this, but you have become greedier than Wario.
$10 add-on on a $60 game that never goes on sale, something other companies do for free.

doesn't look any better except maybe slightly less pixelated? Like yeah the frame-rate no longer chugs, so that's nice - I expected more tbh.

Why is there less foliage movement in the Switch 2 edition?
What is this supposed to be showing?

Drop the prices, looking for a steam deck rn
I have waited years and you lock it behind a $630 (CAD) Console?
Why do gamers have to pay for a game they already own. This is absurd. #droptheprice
Not enough to buy new hardware for $450. Also have to pay to “upgrade”.
Nah, I'll pass, Nintendo. You just keep your prices up and I won't be buying anything. It's ridiculous.

So let me get this straight. So you're gonna charge us $30 for enhancements when the competition does it for free? Sony charges $10 but at least it's a brand new remaster with new models and textures. You're not even doing that. Can you get any more greedy?
Does the switch 2 look worse or am i just baked as fuq
I did this years ago on Yuzu for free lmaoooo
Wow it's kinda surreal to hear official Nintendo voices finally dissing BotW's performance
DROP THE PRICE.

Yall didn't complain when they were selling you expensive cardboard. XD

Remember when generational console updates were a massive leap forward?

I wouldn't say this feels like a mid-gen refresh, but as a Switch 1 owner, it's... underwhelming.
Who in there right mind is gonna pay $30 for an upgrade of a game they already own
I see no difference sadly
You can do it even faster on an emulator, believe it or not.
NaN
Drop the prices
Barely looks better, skipping this console. Get back to making regular consoles, the hybrid consoles are wack. Make a new game boy on the side or something!
Drop the prices chief.
I basically play Mario and Zelda on it. Switch 2 will cost more, same low frames, $80 games, etc. I’ll stick with PC and skip Mario and Zelda for a while

I'm more than happy with my N64, GameCube, and original Switch
I see no big improvement

Looks the same.  Thought it would be a remaster from the ground up w/ impressive next gen graphics.

before the narrative was we don’t care bout graphics all we care bout is the gameplay and user experience  years later they bout to drop the switch pro at least for me that’s what I think it is only to produce better lighting and better frame rates
Games being $80 - $90? No thanks

Such an old game that was not even switch native... and you have the NERVE and the GREED of charging 70...again....
Nah!!
4 seconds worth $450 lmao
NaN
Show the Wii U comparison
Imagine paying for an "upgrade" that looks pretty much the same.

Original Switch (2017) = 2015 smartphone tech.

Switch 2 (2025) = 2021–2022 handheld/console hybrid tech.

Complete Shameless mode to compare these two like OG Switch like had a Chance. am going to be praying on your downfall just like What happened With 3DS and Wii and Wii U.
so is it emulatable or not?, aint just a buying dogshit upgrade for a game i already own
I know the game can look beautiful. I've seen people emulate it in 8k. it should be free for season pass/DLC owners. Same goes for TOTK. Also Drop the Price.
Imagine upgrading from a RTX 4080 to a RTX 5080 then having to pay £10 for each game you own to play at a higher FPS, cmon Nintendo have a word with yourself.
Drop the price
Imagine charging $20 for a res bump. Nintendo is shameless.
Scam company...same picture
Out of all the negative reactions to prices and stuff, this actually looks sick. Definitely buying upgrade packs for both totk and botw assuming they are no more than $10
love the new color grading too
Wii u game at 80 bucks , hell NO
Twitter compression is not helping the comparison lmao

…I barely noticed the difference for a few seconds.

It looks much nicer, but it doesn’t affect the gameplay really. It’s just prettier version, so why should I really want to pay another $10 bucks to port something I already own and could already play.
I legitimately thought switch 2 was switch 1 lol
The new one looks objectively worse. They removed the subtle fog/sunbeams and disabled the grass swaying in the wind.
